title: Nomad launches premium MagSafe ‘Base One’ charger with glass/aluminum design [Hands-on]
content:
Nomad has launched its first device with official MagSafe charging today. The Base One features a full glass and aluminum design, a weighty build, and more. Follow along for all the details including a hands-on look at this premium MagSafe charger.

more…

The post Nomad launches premium MagSafe ‘Base One’ charger with glass/aluminum design [Hands-on] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Nomad has launched its premium MagSafe charger for iPhone - the Base One. Check out a hands-on look at this glass and aluminum build.
